channel.title: Comments on: Alice responds
channel.description: Won't you join me for a crazy crazy China adventure?

item.title: by: Jane
item.description:
...She said right,you are really a great man.
Have a wonderful trip!
Pukie
item.content:encoded:
…She said right,you are really a great man.

Have a wonderful trip!

Pukie

item.title: by: Andrew
item.description: Ping... Clarity of mind means clarity of passion, too; this is why a great and clear mind loves ardently and sees distinctly what it loves...
item.content:encoded:
Ping…

Clarity of mind means clarity of passion, too; this is why a great and clear mind loves ardently and sees distinctly what it loves…

item.title: by: Michelle Allerdice
item.description: If it makes you feel good, I think you're really cool, too.
item.content:encoded: If it makes you feel good, I think you’re really cool, too.

item.title: by: marcus
item.description: Just give her all the dirt on the good ole US of A
